mapper.select: SELECT amount FROM product WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into product(name, price, amount, info) values (#{name}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{info})
insert into product_image(product_id, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME, RENAME_FILE_NAME, SAVE_PATH) values (#{productId}, #{originFileName}, #{renameFileName}, #{savePath})
mapper.update: UPDATE order_list AS o JOIN ( SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id FROM order_list WHERE email = #{email} ORDER BY createdAt ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS subquery ) AS t ON o.id = t.id SET o.amount = o.amount + #{totalAmount}, o.price = o.price + #{totalPrice};
